summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of Property Sales and Property Inquiries feature for ServisPro platform. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed property sales display on landing page, inquiry modal, and admin management features are working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Approved 3 property sales for testing. Created test property inquiries during E2E testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Property Sales and Inquiries feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: GET /api/property-sales (approved_only=true), GET /api/admin/property-sales, PUT /api/admin/property-sales/{id}/approve, POST /api/property-sales/{id}/inquiries, GET /api/admin/property-inquiries, PUT /api/admin/property-inquiries/{id} all working. Frontend: Landing page shows approved property sales with 'Vérifié' badge, inquiry modal works with form submission, Admin dashboard 'Ventes Véhicules' > 'Demandes Immobilier' tab shows all inquiries with status management (Marquer Contacté, Marquer Terminé).

backend_apis: GET /api/property-sales?approved_only=true - Returns only approved property sales (200 OK)
GET /api/property-sales/{id} - Get single property sale (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/property-sales - Admin list all property sales (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/property-sales/pending - Admin list pending sales (200 OK)
PUT /api/admin/property-sales/{id}/sold - Mark property as sold (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/property-inquiries - Admin list all inquiries (200 OK)
frontend_landing_page: 'Propriétés à Vendre' section - displays only approved property sales
Property cards with 'Vérifié' badge for approved properties
Property inquiry modal with form fields: name, phone, email, budget, financing type, message
Form submission with success toast notification
frontend_admin_dashboard: 'Ventes Véhicules' tab - contains property inquiries sub-tab
'Demandes Immobilier' sub-tab with badge showing pending count
Inquiry list showing customer name, phone, property info, status
Inquiry details panel showing: customer info, property details, agent info, message
Admin notes textarea for adding notes
'Marquer Contacté' button - updates status to contacted
'Marquer Terminé' button - updates status to completed
Success toast 'Demande mise à jour !' on status update
